thread.title: Re: ‘LOL’: Touré thinks THIS is why Americans are losing ‘ability to trust media’?
thread.title_full: Re: ‘LOL’: Touré thinks THIS is why Americans are losing ‘ability to trust media’?

author: skypilot77
title: Re: ‘LOL’: Touré thinks THIS is why Americans are losing ‘ability to trust media’?
text:
‘LOL’: Touré thinks THIS is why Americans are losing ‘ability to trust media’? Posted at 5:43 pm on February 16, 2017 by Doug P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Among those who weren’t happy with Donald Trump’s media-slamming performance at today’s press conference is Touré: To say “media is dishonest” is ridiculous. Serious media is never purposely dishonest. People work hard trying to get everything right.
